text: Will & Grace is an Emmy winning American television sitcom. The show is set in New York City. It features four best friends, Will Truman (Eric McCormack), Grace Adler (Debra Messing), Jack McFarland (Sean Hayes) and Karen Walker (Megan Mullally). It was first aired in series beginning 1998 and series finale aired in 2006. It ran for 8 seasons for a total of 194 episodes. == Cast == *Eric McCormack as Will Truman *Debra Messing as Grace Adler *Sean Hayes as Jack McFarland *Megan Mullally as Karen Walker == References == == Other websites == * Category:1998 American television series debuts Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2000s LGBT television series Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:2010s LGBT television series Category:American LGBT television programs Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:LGBT comedy television series Category:NBC network series Category:Television series about friendship Category:Television series set in New York City Category:English-language television programs
title: Will & Grace
